participant_2.background:
I play music to cheer myself up.
i am stuck in a wheel chair.
i live with a roommate.
i love to listen to music.
I was saddened by the death of my favorite horse, but I am grateful for the many years of companionship we shared.

content.text: Not much, just playing music to cheer myself up.
I like to listen to a lot of different kinds of music, but I'm particularly in love with folk music right now.
That's a tough one, but I think I'd have to say "The Weight" by The Band.
Oh, that's a classic. I love that song too!
It's so beautiful and meaningful. What kind of music do you like to make?
I'm more into rock and roll, but I also love folk music. I'm really passionate about music and I love expressing myself through it.
That's awesome! I love music too. It's such a great way to connect with people and express yourself.
I agree! What's your favorite instrument to play?
I love playing the guitar. It's so versatile and expressive.
I love the guitar too! It's such a beautiful instrument.
I'm glad you like it! I love talking about music. It's one of my favorite things to do.
